tool_description: Identifies specific product or service aspects mentioned in customer feedback to understand what customers are discussing.

text.description: Customer feedback text to extract aspects from

business_domain.description: Business domain context (e.g., restaurant, software, retail, healthcare)

custom_aspects.description: Custom aspect categories to look for

extract_sentiment_per_aspect.description: Whether to determine sentiment for each extracted aspect

error_messages: Empty text: Provide customer feedback text for aspect extraction.
Invalid business domain: Specify a valid business domain context.
Too many custom aspects: Limit custom aspects to maximum 20 items.
Text too short: Provide sufficient text for meaningful aspect extraction.
usage: Input customer text and specify business domain. Optionally provide custom aspect categories. Returns extracted aspects with their sentiment associations.

aspect_sentiments.description: Sentiment associated with each extracted aspect

aspect_frequency.description: Frequency count of each aspect mention
